title: "MIT and MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab help machines see better using spatial acoustics"
excerpt: "Researchers at MIT and MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab have created a technique that allows machines to better perceive their immediate environment. This is done using a machine-learning model that accurately captures the way sound interacts with an environment."
